column1: The Purple Pig////The ravioletto tasted only like brown butter; neither the truffle
column2: rosemary or garlic were detectable. Of the seven dishes we ordered
column3: we were only happy with two- the fried pork ear and half duck. Even then
column4: the yogurt sauce and roe that accompanied the duck didn't enhance the dish or make it taste any better. The duck would have been better served over plain rice with plain roasted vegetables
